reporter_caption.center: PROVIDENCE STEEL IRON CO., INC. v. FLAMMAND, 412 A.2d 257 (R.I. 1980)

caption.center: PROVIDENCE STEEL IRON CO., INC. v. Ronald A. FLAMMAND d/b/a et al.

opinion.attorneys:
Abedon Visconti Ltd., Girard R. Visconti, Providence, for plaintiff.
Cappalli, Greco Ialongo, Richard A. Cappalli, Cranston, for defendants.
opinion.opinion_text:
[1] ORDER [2] The plaintiff's motion to affirm the judgment of the Superior Court pursuant to Rule 16(g) is assigned to the motion calendar for Wednesday, March 5, 1980 at 9:30 a.m. for oral argument.
[3] DORIS, J., did not participate.
